contents:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Petition for allowance of appeal granted. Order of the Superior Court, 298 Pa.Super. 615, 443 A.2d 401, vacated and case remanded for consideration in light of Commonwealth v. Sorrell, 500 Pa. 355, 456 A.2d 1326 (1982, reargument denied, March 11, 1983).
NIX, McDERMOTT, and HUTCHINSON, JJ., dissent.
